session.goal: M5: Beta Launch — build, deploy, onboarding, feedback

changes.summary: M5 Beta Launch IN_PROGRESS. Completed: production build optimization (code splitting from 700KB to 14 chunks, largest 195KB/55KB gz), Netlify deployment config (netlify.toml + _redirects), .env.example with 4 env vars, WelcomeOnboarding component (2-step flow), FeedbackWidget component (floating button + modal). 247 tests still passing, 0 TS/ESLint errors.

files_modified.description: Added manual chunks for vendor splitting (react, ui, data, google)
React.lazy code splitting for MorningFlow/RPMWizard/TitanDashboard/PatternInterrupt, Suspense wrappers, runtime env logging, WelcomeOnboarding + FeedbackWidget integration
Netlify build config, SPA redirects, cache + security headers
Documents all 4 env vars with instructions
2-step onboarding: feature overview + Google connect, localStorage persistence, skip option
Floating feedback button + modal form with bug/feature/general types, localStorage storage
M5 status IN_PROGRESS, M5-1 through M5-6 marked complete with details

decisions_made.decision: Vite manual chunks for vendor splitting
decisions_made.rationale: Separates rarely-changing vendor code from app code for better caching

decisions_made.decision: Feedback stored in localStorage not RxDB
decisions_made.rationale: Avoids schema migration complexity for a beta collection feature; feedback is transient
First-time users should understand the app before being prompted for daily planning
Needs privacy-respecting analytics provider selection — not a blocker for beta launch

next_immediate_step.action: Deploy to Netlify and begin beta validation
next_immediate_step.details: Push sandbox branch to remote, connect repo to Netlify dashboard, set env vars in Netlify UI, deploy. Then begin M5-7 (onboard beta users) with the test Gmail account.

next_three_steps.details: Share deployed URL with beta testers, provide the test Google account for those who need it
Monitor feedback entries in localStorage, triage bug reports vs feature requests
Address critical bugs found during beta testing, prioritize UX issues

blockers: Netlify CLI cannot be installed in current environment (EACCES). Deployment must be done via Netlify dashboard or by user.
continuation.context_notes: M0-M5 (build tasks) complete. 247 tests, 15 files, 0 failures. Build: 14 chunks, largest 195KB/55KB gz, ~6s build time. User provided test Gmail: monmaclabs@gmail.com. Full autonomy directive active. M5-7 through M5-10 require deployment + real users.
